statements: UPDATE CyberbullyingEvidence SET bully_name='John Doe', victim_name='Jane Smith' WHERE incident_id=1;

UPDATE CyberbullyingEvidence SET victim_name = 'Alice', bully_name = 'Bob', timestamp = '2023-01-15 09:45:00' WHERE incident_id = 456
UPDATE CyberbullyingIncidents SET description='Resolved Cyberbullying Case', reported_by='Anonymous' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE CyberbullyingUsers SET email='newemail@example.com', last_login='2022-12-31 23:59:59' WHERE user_id=5;
UPDATE CyberbullyingIncidents SET description = 'Incident updated description' WHERE id = 101;
UPDATE CyberbullyingUsers SET role = 'Admin', last_login = '2022-01-15 08:30:00' WHERE user_id = 25;
UPDATE CyberbullyingIncidents SET bully_name='John Doe', incident_date='2022-09-15' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE ActionsTaken SET action_description='Cyberbully reported to authorities', action_date='2022-10-01' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE CyberbullyingIncidents SET evidence = 'Video footage available' WHERE id = 123;
UPDATE ActionsTaken SET action_description = 'Referred the case to law enforcement' WHERE incident_id = 456;
UPDATE Evidence SET description = 'Evidence updated for incident on 2021-10-20' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Attachments SET attachment_url = 'http://example.com/update.jpg' WHERE evidence_id = 1;
UPDATE Evidence SET victim_name = 'Alice', bully_name = 'Bob', description = 'Incident involving name-calling' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Comments SET comment = 'This is a serious issue, should be addressed immediately' WHERE comment_id = 5;
UPDATE cyberbullying_reports SET incident_description = 'Harassment and threats' WHERE report_id = 1;
UPDATE reported_user SET user_role = 'Moderator' WHERE username = 'johndoe';
UPDATE cyberbullying_reports SET incident_description = 'Updated incident details', evidence_image = E'\xDEADBEEF' WHERE report_id = 1;
UPDATE reported_user SET email = 'new_email@example.com', user_role = 'Moderator' WHERE user_id = 3;
